short_summary: Long Range Radar Sites - Replacement of Power Generation Systems
description: Consultant services to support the replacement of the North Warning System, Long Range Radar Sites (10) power generation and associated systems located in the Yukon, Northwest Territories and Nunavut Territories and Newfoundland and Labrador. Services will cover, but is not limited to, design services such as option analysis, design development, construction document preparation, performance specification creation, cost estimating, tender phase services, construction phase services, and commissioning.
